Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2103.task.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Task>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventTask, ToDoTask

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Task>, java.lang.Cloneable
    Containing methods for the inherited methods in concrete Task classes: DeadlineTask, FloatingTask, and PeriodicTask
